channel.title: Client Is Not Connecting
channel.description: The server was working fine 1 hour ago, Now the client wont connect. I am using a router, With speed boost from cablevision. The wifi is working fine and internet is working fine. I have no idea why client is not connecting to the server. ____________________________________________________________ Fixed How? My IPv4 Changed from 4 to 3 thats why. I had to change it in my router cPanel.

item.title: Client Is Not Connecting
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

The server was working fine 1 hour ago, Now the client wont connect.
I am using a router, With speed boost from cablevision.
The wifi is working fine and internet is working fine.
I have no idea why client is not connecting to the server.

Fixed
How?
My IPv4 Changed from 4 to 3 thats why.
I had to change it in my router cPanel.

Read full topic
